description:
INSTALL PAID APPS FOR FREE AND SAVE HUNDREDS OF DOLLARS! 

Apps Promo is the best tool to discover the latest and the greates deals in the App Store, everyday! 

"It is a great tool for those who are looking to save money on apps." 
-AppAdvice 
------------------------------------ 

Apps Promo allows you to: 

Promotions: 
See a number of different promotions and sales in the app store in all types of categories, saving you hundreds of dollars immediately! 

Bundles: 
Select from a number of different bundles, updated daily, to help you find the app you are looking for and to discover the ones you weren't! 

Discover: 
A new feature of Apps Promo which allows you to search for any app by name and see all related apps available to download directly in Apps Promo. Done in a visually appealing manner, Apps Promo makes discovering similar apps that you already like, even easier! 

My Apps: 
See all the apps you have downloaded using Apps Promo in the My Apps tab, as well as see your current apps on your device in one detailed list. 

- Receive push notifications letting you know of the latest app to go FREE in the App Store 

-Sharing your favorite apps is even easier with Apps Promo by either sending an email from your device or posting straight to your Facebook profile. 

With this app, you will never miss out on a promotion. We share with you valuable apps for free! 

-Note: Certain features from the old version are no longer available with this update.
releaseNotes: Removed a serious bug that made the application crash sometimes.
